data.title: Shahid Kapoor, Kriti Sanon Movie Title and Release Date Revealed
data.meta_description: On January 10, 2024, the makers of Shahid Kapoor and Kriti Sanon’s upcoming movie revealed a new poster of the film along with the title – Teri Baaton Mein Aisa Uljha Jiya. The anticipation among the fans is high as the movie will hit theaters on February 9, 2024. Earlier, it was set to release […] The post Shahid Kapoor, Kriti Sanon Movie Title and Release Date Revealed appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
data.text:
On January 10, 2024, the makers of Shahid Kapoor and Kriti Sanon’s upcoming movie revealed a new poster of the film along with the title – Teri Baaton Mein Aisa Uljha Jiya. The anticipation among the fans is high as the movie will hit theaters on February 9, 2024. Earlier, it was set to release in October 2023.

Directed by Amit Joshi and Aradhana Sah, the film is produced by Dinesh Vijan, Jyoti Deshpande, and Laxman Utekar under the banner of Maddock Films. The film features Shahid Kapoor and Kriti Sanon in the lead roles. Apart from this, the film also features veteran actors Dharmendra and Dimple Kapadia.

Teri Baaton Mein Aisa Uljha Jiya first look poster reveals release date

As mentioned earlier, the filmmakers revealed a new poster with the film’s title. It features the pair of Shahid and Kriti in a romantic scene. This poster has created a lot of curiosity among the audience. The poster hints at a romantic love story, further asserted by the tagline, “An impossible love story.”

Furthermore, showing their excitement, the lead cast, Shahid and Kriti, also shared the film poster on their social media handles. Through her Instagram, Kriti shared with the caption, “This Valentine’s week, experience an impossible love story!”

You can check the new poster below:

In addition, Shahid Kapoor also shared the same poster along with the same caption. The caption assures that the movie release coincides with Valentine’s week.

For those unaware, Kriti Sanon was last seen in Ganapath, featuring Tiger Shroff and Amitabh Bachchan. She faced some criticism for Adipurush, directed by Om Raut. Meanwhile, the audience last saw Shahid Kapoor in Bloody Daddy. The upcoming movie will mark the first collaboration between these two stars.

As this romantic love story is releasing around Valentine’s Day, it will be interesting to see how the audience reacts to it.
